name: Do Not Provoke Aliens
description:
Do Not Provoke Aliens with shots
Or they hunt you

Simple touch and move game, just walk on checkpoints and Do Not Provoke Aliens

Do Not Provoke Aliens features:
✓ Endless checkpoints based game. Pick-up the checkpoints
✓ There are Aliens you should Not Provoke
✓ Control your character, get to the checkpoints safely without Provoking the Aliens
✓ So, this is a Fast-paced, 3D endless game
✓ Suitable for players who like agile games
✓ Simple game, suitable for everyone
✓ Touch and hold to move to the checkpoints
✓ A game just takes a few minutes, you can play at any time
✓ Support both mobiles and tablets
